static java.util.ArrayList<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Statement> orderStatements(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model statementsModel, Initializer myInitializer)
          Returns the statements in the model sorted as follows: First all properties with focus on the concept natture of a code Then all properties with focus on the "code" nature of the code The all other properties For each group, multiple assertions of the same property are sorted by the object (if literal), following some heuristics for codes (@see CodeComparator)
static java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Statement> orderStatementsByLiteralObject(java.util.Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Statement> statSet, TerminologyFactory tf)
          Returns the statements in the model sorted by the skos:notation of the object, when this is a resource.

orderStatements

public static java.util.ArrayList<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Statement> orderStatements(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model statementsModel,
                                                                                       Initializer myInitializer)
Returns the statements in the model sorted as follows: First all properties with focus on the concept natture of a code Then all properties with focus on the "code" nature of the code The all other properties For each group, multiple assertions of the same property are sorted by the object (if literal), following some heuristics for codes (@see CodeComparator)

Parameters:
statementsModel -
myInitializer -
Returns:

orderStatementsByLiteralObject

public static java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Statement> orderStatementsByLiteralObject(java.util.Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Statement> statSet,
                                                                                                       TerminologyFactory tf)
Returns the statements in the model sorted by the skos:notation of the object, when this is a resource. This is assuming that the skos:notation is unique and makes use of the heuristics in @see CodeComparator

Parameters:
statSet -
tf -
Returns:
